text: @GeraldoRivera @realDonaldTrump @JoeBiden Exactly what respect is due a bullying, lying, philandering, sexually predatory, multi bankrupt con man? His administration's mishandling of the response to #CoronavirusPandemic will result in thousands of dead Americans.
